Text:
Unfortunately, the video quality is not good at all. Not just resolution, but it seems that it was copied from maybe a 700mb file, then kind of up-scaled to a half-size .iso - with predictably terrible results.
The audio is proper 5.1, though...
Thanks for the effort though, uploader. Now I'm off to try to find this somewhere else!
@ cinesimon: Thanks for the warning. I'm going to avoid this. @ uploader: Let it die for fuck sake.
